operations.content:
version: '1.0'
scenarios:
  - name: get_letter_preview
    steps:
      - action: fetch_letter
        url: /api/get_letter
        method: GET
        params:
          search: %D8%AA%D9%82%D8%B1%D9%8A%D8%B1
      - action: parse_response
        key: data

meta.content:
version: '1.0'
scenarios:
  - name: get_letter_preview
